summary: Completed comprehensive testing of enhanced Airbnb property listing application. Backend APIs fully functional (7/7 tests passed), frontend UI works perfectly including booking flow, view toggles, price calculations, and mobile responsiveness. All core requirements verified successfully.

minor_issues.issue: Frontend uses hardcoded API_URL logic instead of environment variables

passed_tests: Backend health check endpoint working
Booking creation API with multipart form data
Get all bookings API returns correct data
Get single booking by ID working
Aadhaar file download endpoint functional
File upload validation (type and size) working
Guest count validation (1-4 guests) working
Index page loads with 4 property listings
Navigation to Siddha SkyView Studio details page
Traveller/Host view toggle works on desktop and mobile
Form fields accept input (name, phone, dates, guests)
Date picker validation accepts valid date ranges
Guest selector works with 1-4 guest options
Dynamic price calculation: ₹2,500 base + ₹500 per extra guest
Price calculation examples verified (2 guests/2 nights = ₹5,000, 3 guests/2 nights = ₹6,000)
Host view displays booking dashboard correctly
Booking cards show all details (ID, guest, dates, price, phone, status)
Aadhaar file retention shows 7-year compliance period
View Aadhaar button opens modal for file viewing
Mobile responsiveness at 375px width perfect
Image grid adapts to single column on mobile
Form layout switches to single column on mobile
All UI elements remain functional on mobile devices
Book Now button properly disabled until Aadhaar uploaded
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider updating frontend to use environment variables for API URL configuration following standard practices (REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL). All functionality works perfectly as-is, but env var approach would be more maintainable.
success_percentage: backend: 100% (7/7 tests passed), frontend: 95% (minor config improvement suggested)
